Stefano_package.components._2d

Class CadRectangle

  • java.lang.Object
    • Stefano_package.components.CadComponent
      • Stefano_package.components._2d.CadRectangle
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ICadComponent

    public class CadRectangle
extends CadComponent
    This concrete class represent a rectangle, with the base point at the upper left. It has a static number that helps generating automatically non-colliding names and obviously width and height parameters.

    • Nested Class Summary

      • Nested classes/interfaces inherited from interface Stefano_package.components.ICadComponent

        ICadComponent.Axis

      This static number is used to avoid conflicts in Stefano_package.components name assigning an increasing number when a component is created

      This is the height of the rectangle
      private int r_width
      This is the width of the rectangle

      • projection

        public int[] projection(ICadComponent.Axis ax)
        Description copied from interface: ICadComponent
        This method will be used in order to detect collisions: it projects the component on the selected axis (2D component) or on the plane where the axis is the normal (3D component)
        Parameters:
        ax - the axis to project on
        Returns:
        the x1 and x2 of the segment in a 2-element array
